RelatedSentence: There 's still time for people to put forward their nominations for the Manchester Schools Awards .
If you think your school is the best , your class is amazing , your teacher is tops or your headteacher is fabulous , then tell us about them .
There are also categories to recognise school support staff , schools that promote healthy living and schools that are active in the community .
We even have a category for the best school newspaper or website .
There will be a certificate of entry for everyone who takes part but our panel of judges will have the difficult decision of deciding the finalists which will be revealed next month .
